sourcesContent:
<template>
  <svg :class="svgClass" aria-hidden="true">
    <use :xlink:href="iconName" />
  </svg>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "svgIcon",
  props: {
    iconClass: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    className: {
      type: String,
      default: ""
    }
  },
  computed: {
    iconName() {
      return `#icon-${this.iconClass}`;
    },
    svgClass() {
      if (this.className) {
        return `svg-icon ` + this.className;
      } else {
        return `svg-icon`;
      }
    }
  },
  data: function() {
    return {};
  },
  methods: {}
};
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
.svg-icon {
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  fill: currentColor;
  color: #fff;
  // font-size: 26px;
}
</style>
